questions.text: How old was Mitchell while he was in the 'Outback'?
questions.explanation:
23.

	Mitchell was the youngest guy there.

questions.text: In what state was Mitchell born in?
questions.explanation:
South Dakota.

	Mitchell now lives in Union City, N.J.

questions.text: Mitchell has a tattoo of what on his hip?
What was the reason he wanted to be voted out early?
questions.explanation:
He was too weak.

	Because of his size he needed to eat a lot of food, and the Outback didn't provide much food.

Song Book.

	Mitchell never used it while he was there.

questions.text: True or False: Mitchell's parents live on a farm?
questions.explanation:
true & t & yes & y.

	They live on a 220-acre farm in Vermillion, South Dakota.

questions.text: Who did Mitchell hate the most in his tribe?
questions.explanation:
Keith.

	Mitchell said right to the camera that Keith was his least favourite person in the tribe.

questions.text: Who did Mitchell have a tie with at Tribal Council?
questions.explanation:
Keith.

	Mitchell had to leave, because he had one vote from a previous Tribal Council.

questions.text: What is Mitchell's favourite TV show?
questions.explanation:
'Will and Grace'.

	He said he had two favourites, 'Will and Grace' and 'The Price is Right', but when asked what his one favourite was, he said 'Will and Grace'.

questions.text: In Mitchell's entry video, who did he have stand beside him to show his size?
